snippet: For the second time this season, Daniel Alfredsson of the Senators was unable to finish a game at Madison Square Garden, apparently because of a head injury.
abstract: Ottawa Senators rally to beat New York Rangers in Game 2 of their first-round playoff series after hard hit sends Senators captain Daniel Alfredsson to the sidelines with head injury.
lead_paragraph: For the second time this season, Daniel Alfredsson of the Senators was unable to finish a game at Madison Square Garden, apparently because of a head injury.

headline.seo: N.H.L. Playoffs — Senators Rally After Alfredsson Is Injured
headline.main: Ottawa Rallies Around Alfredsson After a Hard Hit Sends Him Off for the Evening
headline.print_headline: Ottawa Rallies Around Alfredsson After a Hard Hit Sends Him Off for the Evening
